body:
Yes, this is a known issue with the latest package we built at NREL. We changed our build process getting evalglare to work, and now qtrvu is busted. It’s a right mess. Jason DeGraw and I are looking into it off and on but we don’t have an answer yet. Recommend you use the previous release for now if that’s possible. Sorry!


- Rob
___
